summary: Building an app that includes amp-like controls and a full in-app music creation/composition feature (piano roll, virtual instruments, timeline editing) with the ability to open the composer and import audio files from the user’s device.

existing_features.title: Add an in-app “amp-like” control panel (in the same app) that visually resembles a guitar amp section and provides real-time audio shaping controls for the guitar audio path (at minimum: input gain/drive, 3-band EQ, presence, and output/master).

Add a clear option/button in the UI to open the music-creation composer screen inside the same app, and implement navigation/state so users can enter and exit the composer without losing unsaved work unexpectedly.
Implement a full visual music composer interface that supports a piano-roll style editor and timeline editing (multi-step grid with pitch rows and variable note lengths) for composing melodies.

Support uploading/importing an existing audio file from the user’s device into the composer and make it usable during playback (at minimum: load, preview, and place it on the timeline or trigger it reliably).

Ensure compositions saved/loaded through the existing composition manager continue to work with the new composer data (piano-roll/timeline data and any imported-audio references), including backward compatibility for previously saved compositions.

new_feature_requests.summary: Add amp-like ("amplefire") control UI/components within the app
Add full visual music composer (piano roll, virtual instruments, timeline editing) inside the app
Provide an in-app option/button to open the music-creation/composer screen
Support uploading/importing existing audio files from the user’s device into the composer

projectName: Add amp-like controls, composer screen, piano-roll timeline, and audio file import to J Music App
